reviewText: The movie had a good cast and the previews were very funny, but when I received the movie and started to watch I was very disappointed.  I lost interest very soon and didn't even bother to watch the entire movie.
Although not as funny as we had hoped, this was enjoyable fun for a one time through.  Great actors worth watching.
This is a great overlooked comedy with a great cast including Danny Aiello and Judd Hirsch. It's well worth a look!!
